name: supersensible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Supersensible things cannot be touched, seen, etc. by the senses: Many welcomed his work as containing solid proof of the existence of those supersensible objects. Empiricism, though it unquestionably insists on sensuous perception, still allows a supersensible world or spiritual reality.
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the concepts in the book is the study of the supersensible being, of which God is an example.He spoke of the achievements that have resulted from applying supersensible truths to human endeavour. There can be no such thing as a purely objective presentation of supersensible truth on the plane of the senses.
